Description: Great location! Three bedroom duplex apartment in two-family house available SEPTEMBER 1. Renovated kitchen, bath, in-unit laundry. Hardwood floors throughout. Two bedrooms are located on the top floor, along with one bathroom and laundry, and the bottom level has a large bedroom (with two closets), kitchen/living room, and full bathroom. Proximity to MIT/Kendall Square. Both green line and red line T-stations, buses, Kendall Sq and Cambridge Street restaurants and other conveniences nearby, including Galleria Shopping Mall, major roads.
